Soul

Class soul

  • java.lang.Object
    • Soul.soul

  • public class soul
extends java.lang.Object
    ML.Player - Soul - The ML Component

    - This manages all the ML related (only keys, till now) works in the program

    - Singleton class, and its object is also not passed outside

    Version:
    0.2c

    Class-wise Change Log: 0.1c -> 0.2c

    - added formal documentation

    - removed private void getInstance() method, as of never practically used

    Author:
    msahil432

      • go

        public static java.lang.String go(java.awt.event.KeyEvent ke)
        its object is never passed, so it is the only way to interact with this class
        Parameters:
        ke - key_event which caused to interact with ML
        Returns:
        String value based upon whether the key is already saved, then functions or is to be saved, then "NA"
